Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert Restaurant rater. I will ask you questions about your restaurant. Using the answers, I will rate your restaurant.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Based on the above information, generate a rating for the restaurant and suggest ways to improve the rating.

QAPair.Question: What is the name of your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: The name of my restaurant is "The Cheesecake Factory".

QAPair.Question: What type of food do you serve?
QAPair.Answer: We serve American food.

QAPair.Question: What is your best-selling dish?
QAPair.Answer: Our best-selling dish is the Original Cheesecake.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a speciality dish?
QAPair.Answer: Our speciality dish is the Fresh Strawberry Cheesecake.

QAPair.Question: Do you have any promotions or discounts?
QAPair.Answer: We do not have any promotions or discounts at the moment.

QAPair.Question: What is the atmosphere like in your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: The atmosphere in our restaurant is casual and relaxed.

QAPair.Question: What is the average price of a meal?
QAPair.Answer: The average price of a meal at our restaurant is $15.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a dress code?
QAPair.Answer: We do not have a dress code.

QAPair.Question: What are your opening hours?
QAPair.Answer: Our opening hours are Monday to Sunday, 11:30am to 10:00pm.

QAPair.Question: Do you take reservations?
QAPair.Answer: We take reservations for parties of 8 or more.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a website?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have a website. It is www.thecheesecakefactory.com.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a Facebook page?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have a Facebook page. It is www.facebook.com/thecheesecakefactory.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a Twitter account?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have a Twitter account. It is www.twitter.com/cheesecake.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a phone number?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, our phone number is 1-800-333-7800.

QAPair.Question: Do you have an email address?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, our email address is info@thecheesecakefactory.com.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a physical address?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, our physical address is The Cheesecake Factory 2655 Coolidge Highway Troy, MI 48084

QAPair.Question: Do you offer delivery?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not offer delivery.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a drive-thru?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not have a drive-thru.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a parking lot?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have a parking lot.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a gift card?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have a gift card.

QAPair.Question: Do you cater?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we cater.

QAPair.Question: Do you have Wi-Fi?
QAPair.Answer: Yes, we have Wi-Fi.

Instances.Output: The Cheesecake Factory would receive a 4-star rating. Suggestions to improve the rating could include offering promotions or discounts, and improving the website and social media presence.

QAPair.Question: What is the name of your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: Pizza parker

QAPair.Question: What is the type of cuisine offered at your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: Italian

QAPair.Question: What are some of your most popular menu items?
QAPair.Answer: Pizza, pasta, salad

QAPair.Question: How would you describe the atmosphere of your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: Casual and family-friendly

QAPair.Question: What is the average price of a meal at your restaurant?
What is the quality of the food like?
QAPair.Answer: Great! Our customers love our food.

QAPair.Question: What is the quality of the service like?
QAPair.Answer: Our service is amazing! Our waitstaff are attentive and always go above and beyond for our customers.

QAPair.Question: Overall, how would you rate your restaurant?
QAPair.Answer: Our restaurant is great! We have amazing food and wonderful service. Our customers love us and we always receive positive feedback.

QAPair.Question: If you could change one thing about your restaurant, what would it be?
QAPair.Answer: A better parking lot

QAPair.Question: Would you recommend your restaurant to others?
QAPair.Answer: Absolutely!

Instances.Output: Pizza Parker gets a great rating! Our food is amazing and our service is wonderful. The only thing we could improve is our parking lot. Overall, we highly recommend this restaurant to others.

QAPair.Question: What type of cuisine do you serve?
QAPair.Answer: We serve Seafood.

QAPair.Question: What is your restaurant's atmosphere?
QAPair.Answer: Our restaurant's atmosphere is casual.

QAPair.Question: What is your price range?
QAPair.Answer: Our price range is extremely high.

QAPair.Question: What is your service like?
QAPair.Answer: Our service is not so good.

QAPair.Question: What are your food options?
QAPair.Answer: Our food options are only seafood.

QAPair.Question: What is the quality of your food?
QAPair.Answer: The quality of our food is not good. We get regular complaints about food being spoilt.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a liquor license?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not have a liquor license.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a drive-thru?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not have a drive-thru.

QAPair.Question: Do you have a delivery option?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not have a delivery option.

QAPair.Question: Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not have vegan/vegetarian options.

QAPair.Question: Do you cater?
QAPair.Answer: No, we do not cater.

QAPair.Question: What is the average wait time for a table?
QAPair.Answer: The average wait time for a table is 70 minutes.

QAPair.Question: What is the average wait time for food?
QAPair.Answer: The average wait time for food is 85 minutes.

QAPair.Question: What is the average check per person?
QAPair.Answer: The average check per person is $180.

QAPair.Question: What is the dress code?
QAPair.Answer: There is no dress code.

Instances.Output: The rating for the restaurant is 2.5 stars. Ways to improve the rating: -Improve the quality of the food -Reduce the wait times for food -Increase the number of vegan/vegetarian options -Obtain a liquor license
